Class MiniGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • MiniGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiceRolls, GuessNumber, PaperScissorsRock

    public abstract class MiniGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of MiniGame represent games that the player can play to defeat villains. Each instance represents one minigame. This class should never be instantiated directly, but rather through its children.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean hasWon
      Set to true if the hero wins the game, otherwise remains false.

      The hero playing the game.
      private Villain villain

    • Method Detail

      • removePowerUps

        public void removePowerUps(PowerUpType type,
                           int numToRemove)
        Removes the given number of power ups of the given type from the hero playing the game. Throws a RuntimeException if the hero does not contain at least this many power ups of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of power up to remove.
        numToRemove - The number of power ups to remove.

      • removeAllPowerUps

        public void removeAllPowerUps(PowerUpType type)
        Removes all the power ups of the given type from the hero playing the game.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of power up to remove.
